# Infinite JRPG

![Game Screenshot](https://storage.googleapis.com/aistudio-public-images/readme_screenshots/infinite-jrpg-gameplay.png)

Embark on a never-ending adventure in a world crafted by AI. Explore, battle, and become a legend in a JRPG that's different every time you play. Powered by Google's Gemini, this game offers a unique, procedurally generated experience right in your browser.

## ‚ú® Features

*   **Truly Infinite Exploration**: The world, its descriptions, encounters, and items are all procedurally generated by the Gemini API, offering endless replayability. No two adventures are the same!
*   **AI-Powered Character Creation**: Bring your hero to life! Describe your character's appearance, and the AI will generate a unique 16-bit pixel art portrait for them.
*   **Classic JRPG Combat**: Engage in tactical, turn-based battles against a bestiary of unique, AI-generated monsters. Exploit their weaknesses and use your skills to emerge victorious.
*   **Deep Character Progression**: Choose from classic classes like the sturdy **Warrior**, the powerful **Mage**, or the nimble **Rogue**. Level up, increase your stats, and find powerful loot to grow stronger.
*   **Save Your Progress**: Your epic journey is saved in your browser's local storage. You can close the game at any time and pick up right where you left off.

## üéÆ How to Play

The game is controlled through simple button clicks.

1.  **Start Your Journey**:
    *   Click `Start Your Journey` to begin a new game.
    *   If you have a previous save file, you can `Load Game` to continue your adventure.

2.  **Create Your Hero**:
    *   Enter a name for your character.
    *   Choose one of the three classes: Warrior, Mage, or Rogue.
    *   Write a short description of your character's appearance (e.g., "A grizzled old warrior with a long white beard and a scar over his left eye").
    *   Click `Generate Portrait` and watch the AI create a unique pixel art image for you.
    *   Once you're happy, click `Start Adventure`!

3.  **Exploring the World**:
    *   Read the text description of your current location.
    *   Choose one of the three actions presented to you.
        *   **Explore** actions will advance you to a new area, often triggering an encounter.
        *   **Encounter** actions guarantee a battle.
        *   **Rest** allows you to recover a portion of your health.

4.  **Engaging in Combat**:
    *   When you encounter enemies, you will enter a turn-based combat screen.
    *   On your turn, choose an action:
        *   **Attack**: Select a target and deal damage.
        *   **Defend**: Reduce the damage you take from the next enemy attack.
        *   **Inventory**: Open your bag to use items, like a healing potion.
        *   **Flee**: Attempt to escape the battle. Be careful, it might not always work!
    *   Defeat all enemies to win the battle, earn XP, and potentially find loot!

## üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

*   **Frontend**: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
*   **AI/Content Generation**: [Google Gemini API](https://ai.google.dev/)

This project serves as a demonstration of how to leverage a powerful Large Language Model (LLM) to create dynamic, procedural, and infinitely variable game content.
